meta.description: CodeWiki - Explore and search code repositories

hero.title: Code Wiki
hero.subtitle: A new perspective on development for the intelligent agent era. Gemini-generated documentation, always up to date.

gemini-cli.name: gemini-cli
gemini-cli.description: An open source AI agent that brings Gemini's powerful capabilities directly to your terminal.

flutter.name: flutter
flutter.description: Flutter makes it easy to build beautiful, fast mobile and cross-platform applications

react.name: react
react.description: A library for building user interfaces for web and native.

python-sdk.name: python-sdk
python-sdk.description: Official Python SDK for Model Context Protocol servers and clients

privateRepos.title: Try with your own private repositories
privateRepos.description: Stop documenting. Start understanding. Connect your repositories to get a fully interactive Code Wiki, perfectly in sync with every change. No more outdated documentation. Ever.

readApp.title: Read your application for the first time
readApp.subtitle: Code documentation that works for you, not the other way around.

understandCode.title: Understand your code section by section
understandCode.description: Focus on the code you care about. Select a section and dive deep into how it works.

autoGenerated.title: Automatically generated
autoGenerated.description: Our AI agents automatically generate and maintain rich, interactive knowledge bases from your code.

alwaysUpToDate.title: Always up to date
alwaysUpToDate.description: Every time a pull request is merged, relevant documentation is automatically updated.

linkToCode.title: Link back to your code
linkToCode.description: Jump instantly from architecture overview to the exact service, or from function description to the definition in your repository.

talkCodebase.title: Talk to your codebase
talkCodebase.description: Ask questions about architecture, find function definitions, and understand complex logic in natural language. Like having an engineer on call 24/7.

browserSection.title: Add the missing dimension to your software
